title: McGill University Publications, Series 2: Botany
additional-notes: This is a Canadian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Some issues of this serial may have distinctive titles.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
Many issues of this serial are articles reprinted from other publications, some of which may still have active copyights. We have not checked the copyrighs status of the original publications.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
